Forward Service. Provides auto-routing of DICOM objects that are received by the DICOM Storage Service to remote DICOM applications. This is done by queueing corresponding retrieve requests to the Move SCU service. org.dcm4chex.archive.dcm.movescu.ForwardService The default constructor ForwardService List of forwarding rules.
Format:
[calling|called=AEtitle]AEtitle!from-to | NONE
where
calling = create a condition for calling AE titles that objects are forwarded from.
called = create a condition for called AE titles that objects are forwared from
AEtitle = the calling AE titles, or the called AE titles, separated by commas.
AEtitle = the AE titles that objects are forwarded to
From =
To =
NONE = Forwarding Rules java.lang.String Comma separated list of AE titles to which objects modified by using the web application are re-forwarded. NONE = do not forward modified objects. Forward Modified to AE Titles java.lang.String Forwarding priority. 0=medium, 1=high, 2=low. Forward Priority int Maximum number of SOP Instance UIDs per Move Request.
